item.title: How I get started!
item.description:
Starting simple

So, putting the cards on the table, I have a hard time getting started with.. well, everything! I have always had that issue, but, thats not what I’m gonna talk about.. or, write about, he he, have to get used to this blogging thing.. Anyway.. Onwards!

What I want to write about today, is how I get started, and this is something my dear wife has taught me: start with something simple!
This requires 4 simple steps, and I will walk through them here.
